content:
# The iron ore has been successfully inserted into the stone furnace, which is now working again and has processed 5 iron plates so far.
# 
# The furnace currently has 4 coal left and 9 iron ore remaining to be smelted. 
# 
# To ensure continuous operation, I should keep an eye on the coal supply and consider harvesting more coal if necessary. 
# 
# I will wait a moment to allow the furnace to complete the smelting process and then check its status again.

# Let's wait for a short duration to see if it completes the smelting.
sleep(10)  # Wait for 10 seconds to allow the furnace to smelt more iron ore. 

# After waiting, I will inspect the furnace and my inventory again.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
print(f"Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
